Style/MethodCallWithArgsParentheses.description:
Description

Use parentheses for method calls with arguments.
Style/MethodCallWithArgsParentheses.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

IgnoreMacros: True (type: bool)
AllowedMethods: [] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
IncludedMacros: [] (type: list)
IncludedMacroPatterns: [] (type: list)
AllowParenthesesInMultilineCall: False (type: bool)
AllowParenthesesInChaining: False (type: bool)
AllowParenthesesInCamelCaseMethod: False (type: bool)
AllowParenthesesInStringInterpolation: False (type: bool)
EnforcedStyle: require_parentheses (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['require_parentheses', 'omit_parentheses'] (type: list)
